org.forgerock.openam.license

Class ConsoleUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.license.ConsoleUser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    User

    public class ConsoleUser
extends Object
implements User
    Command-line interface (CLI) for the console user.
    Since:
    12.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConsoleUser()
      Constructs a CLI using the process standard input and output streams and the default license resource bundle for message localisation.
      ConsoleUser(Writer out, Reader in, ResourceBundle messages)
      Constructs a CLI with the given input and output streams, and using the given resource bundle for message localisation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String ask(String question)
      Asks the user the given question and returns their answer as a string.
      String getMessage(String messageId)
      Get a localised message for display to this user.
      String getName()
      Gets the name of the user.
      void show(String message)
      Directly shows a non-localised (or already localised) message to the user.
      void tell(String messageId)
      Displays the given message to the user, localised to their language/locale.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConsoleUser

        public ConsoleUser(Writer out,
                   Reader in,
                   ResourceBundle messages)
        Constructs a CLI with the given input and output streams, and using the given resource bundle for message localisation.
        Parameters:
        out - the output stream to write messages to.
        in - the input stream to read responses from.
        messages - the resource bundle to use for message localisation.

      • ConsoleUser

        public ConsoleUser()
        Constructs a CLI using the process standard input and output streams and the default license resource bundle for message localisation.

    • Method Detail

      • tell

        public void tell(String messageId)
        Displays the given message to the user, localised to their language/locale. Displays messages on the console with a trailing new line.
        Specified by:
        tell in interface User
        Parameters:
        messageId - the id of the localised message to display.

      • show

        public void show(String message)
        Directly shows a non-localised (or already localised) message to the user. Displays messages directly on the console with a trailing new line.
        Specified by:
        show in interface User
        Parameters:
        message - the message to display verbatim.

      • ask

        public String ask(String question)
        Asks the user the given question and returns their answer as a string. Displays the question on the console (without a trailing newline) and then reads a single line response. Will repeat the question until the user enters non-empty text, or closes the console.
        Specified by:
        ask in interface User
        Parameters:
        question - the id of the question to ask.
        Returns:
        the response from the user, or null if they close the console.

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Gets the name of the user. Returns the user name from the system user.name property.
        Specified by:
        getName in interface User
        Returns:
        the user name.

      • getMessage

        public String getMessage(String messageId)
        Get a localised message for display to this user.
        Specified by:
        getMessage in interface User
        Parameters:
        messageId - the id of the message to get.
        Returns:
        the localised message.
